You "lost" your son the day he received his vaccines and was later on diagnosed with autism. Fuck you. 

Autism is a disorder that shouldn't be looked at wrong. People with ASD are amazing and if you can't love your son the way he is, you're not being the best mother.

1147745956756172800.text: I feel very strongly about this because I have a brother who has autism and hearing my aunts not want to vaccinate their child because "they'll get autism" is so fucking disrespectful.
